author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Sanur Village Festival to reflect indigenous beauty of BaliTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Sanur Village Festival to reflect indigenous beauty of Bali
Celebrating Sanur’s culture and heritage, Sanur Village Festival is all set to kick off today (Aug 26). The Sanur Village Festival will engage visitors with a vast line up of programs and activities including the Sanur Kite Festival, Sanur Auto Festival, fun run, beach clean ups, cultural parades, fishing competitions, music, food and more.
Celebrating its 10th anniversary Sanur Village Festival has chosen “Dasa Warsa” as the sub theme. The Festival will reflect Sanur as a destination with its nature symbol of the new days began and celebrated by the dynamics creativity of Sanur community.
The Festival will be held at the Inna Grand Bali Beach, Maisonette area of Segara Ayu Beach for five days from 26th – 30th August 2015.
Various programs such as Bazar & Food Festival, Fashion Show, Sanur Kreatif Expo, Sanur Village Cycling tour, Culinary Challenge, Yoga performance, Sanur Golf Tournament will be held.
The international kite festival, jukung festival and Sanur Run would definitely sensate the spectators with their breathtaking race.
